name: Restoration Detonation
overrideDescription: Restore [effect0.power] health to a friendly unit. Deal damage to the front enemy unit equal to 5x the amount healed.
cardLoreTooltips: Though usually avoided because of its potentially deadly outcome, an Awokenâ€™s ability to impale themselves with thorns allows them to become a walking nest of spores. Upon bursting, the spores provide additional life with the extra benefit of damage to those nearby.
